movie.title: The Adventures of Mark Twain
movie.description_intro: Based on elements from the stories of Mark Twain, this feature-length Claymation fantasy follows the adventures of Tom Sawyer, Becky Thatcher and Huck Finn as they stowaway aboard the interplanetary balloon of Mark Twain. Twain, disgusted with the human race, is intent upon finding Halley's Comet and crashing into it, achieving his "destiny." It's up to Tom, Becky, and Huck to convince him that his judgment is wrong and that he still has much to offer humanity that might make a difference. Their efforts aren't just charitable; if they fail, they will share Twain's fate. Along the way, they use a magical time portal to get a detailed overview of the Twain philosophy, observing the "historical" events that inspired his works.
movie.description_full: Based on elements from the stories of Mark Twain, this feature-length Claymation fantasy follows the adventures of Tom Sawyer, Becky Thatcher and Huck Finn as they stowaway aboard the interplanetary balloon of Mark Twain. Twain, disgusted with the human race, is intent upon finding Halley's Comet and crashing into it, achieving his "destiny." It's up to Tom, Becky, and Huck to convince him that his judgment is wrong and that he still has much to offer humanity that might make a difference. Their efforts aren't just charitable; if they fail, they will share Twain's fate. Along the way, they use a magical time portal to get a detailed overview of the Twain philosophy, observing the "historical" events that inspired his works.

movies.title: Soul Men
movies.summary: When R&B legend Marcus Hooks dies suddenly, VH-1 invites his original back up duo, Floyd Henderson and Louis Hinds, "The Real Deal," to appear at a memorial tribute at the Apollo Theater. Floyd, who's bored in retirement, wants this more than anything; Louis, a philosophical ex-con, does not. Plus, there's bad blood between them (Louis's wife Odetta left him to marry Floyd - then left Floyd). Floyd begs, Louis consents but won't fly, so they leave L.A. in Floyd's flashy Cadillac with five days to get to New York. On the road, they must get back their vocal chops, renew their friendship, and sort out the past. With Floyd's bad hip and Louis's bad kidneys, will they even make it?

movies.title: Prison Fighters: Five Rounds to Freedom
movies.title_english: Prison Fighters: Five Rounds to Freedom
movies.title_long: Prison Fighters: Five Rounds to Freedom (2017)
movies.summary: After seven years in a Thai prison, a former Muay Thai champion joins a controversial government program that allows inmates to fight for their freedom. A victory in his final fight will grant him a royal pardon and bring him one step closer to the son he left behind.
movies.description_full: After seven years in a Thai prison, a former Muay Thai champion joins a controversial government program that allows inmates to fight for their freedom. A victory in his final fight will grant him a royal pardon and bring him one step closer to the son he left behind.

movies.title: Battle in Space: The Armada Attacks
movies.title_english: Battle in Space: The Armada Attacks
movies.title_long: Battle in Space: The Armada Attacks (2021)
movies.summary: A series of shorts depicting a future in 2420 after aliens and powerful space wizards enslaved human villages until a group of rebels organize a counter attack against their alien overlords by piloting fully loaded spaceships.
movies.description_full: A series of shorts depicting a future in 2420 after aliens and powerful space wizards enslaved human villages until a group of rebels organize a counter attack against their alien overlords by piloting fully loaded spaceships.
movies.synopsis: A series of shorts depicting a future in 2420 after aliens and powerful space wizards enslaved human villages until a group of rebels organize a counter attack against their alien overlords by piloting fully loaded spaceships.

movies.title: Connors' War
movies.summary: A blinded ex special agent is given his sight back by a special serum in order for him to stop a nuke that's hidden somewhere in the city. Things are just starting to complicate.
movies.description_full: A blinded ex special agent is given his sight back by a special serum in order for him to stop a nuke that's hidden somewhere in the city. Things are just starting to complicate.
